title: _SET_VEHICLE_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT
content:
0x9BDA23BF666F0855// SetVehicleCountermeasureCount
void _SET_VEHICLE_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT(Vehicle aircraft, int count);Parameters:aircraft: The vehicle to set the amount of countermeasures on.count: The amount of countermeasures to set on this vehicle.Similar to _SET_AIRCRAFT_BOMB_COUNT, this sets the amount of countermeasures that are present on this vehicle.Use _GET_AIRCRAFT_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNT to get the current amount.Old name:  _SET_AIRCRAFT_COUNTERMEASURE_COUNTExamples:LuaC#local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
SetAircraftCountermeasureCount(vehicle, 10)
